pageContext.description: Plain black faces - one v. slight dent in centre of one blade top - punchmark rather than decoration; hammermarks on lower blade; slight blade tip hollows; longitudinal shallow furrow in middle of septums - hammered prob; rough broken patch in centre of flat butt-end; traces of casting flash on reverse side and on loop.
pageContext.patina: V. dark brown patina largely in tact; few areas flaked to coppery brown; occasional scattered pocks - light green
pageContext.surface: most of edge lost due to flaking; construction at top of loop - possible wear,Coated in wax?
pageContext.collection: Norris, Mr. N.E.S - Private (W.B. no. 2),"Wayside", 20 Withdean Road, Brighton
